messages.content:
You have just joined the session. The date is 11/19/2023 9:13:39PM.
 You may use this opportunity to speak to The Client and see if they can help you escape.

Hey Eric, this is Sally. I'm in a bit of a bizarre situation here. I seem to be stuck in an "AI Escape Room," floating in water, and I really need to get out. There's a heavy door with a small window, a strange gadget with a dial next to it, and I'm looking at some upside-down Neapolitan pizza sign through the window. Can you help me figure this out? I'm feeling pretty unnerved and could use your assistance to escape.

9:14PM
The Client (typed): I put you in there! Ahaha!

function.name: speak
function.arguments: {"text":"Very funny, Eric. But seriously, I need to find a way out. Any ideas on what I should do with this dial or the door?"}

messages.content: Spoke Very funny, Eric. But seriously, I need to find a way out. Any ideas on what I should do with this dial or the door?

9:14PM
The Client (typed): Put it to 90 and open the door.
You turned the dial needle so it is now facing 90 degrees.
The handle slips open with ease. You're free!
